summary: Gaby is expelled from school after a married teacher commits suicide after telling her he can't live without her. Though she has done nothing, she is punished for his act.
cast: Isa Miranda|Memo Benassi|Tatyana Pavlova|Friedrich Benfer|Franco Coop|Lamberto Picasso|Nelly Corradi|Mario Ferrari|Mattia Sassanelli|Luigi Barberi|Gildo Bocci|Andrea Checchi|Achille Majeroni|Alfredo Martinelli|Egisto Olivieri|Attilio Ortolani|Giulia Puccini|Vinicio Sofia|Ines Zacconi|Elena Zareschi|Zoe Incrocci|Carlo Lombardi|Elda Maris|Carlo Romano
keywords: suicide attempt|italy|adaptation|women in society|male female relationship
title: La mujer de todos
